title: MTV Australia screen font
content:
Hello

I am looking for the font of the MTV Australia screen idents. It has some similarities with ITC Conduit, but it does not seem to be quite the same. (the one in the lower part oft the attached image)

Can anybody help me?

Thanks in advance

| --- | --- |
| [mtv.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081209045021/http:/typophile.com/files/mtv_0.jpg) | 24.7 KB |

author: faber

comments.content:
Looks like Gridnik Bold to me.

- Lex
